description:
Junta`s "Mega-Playboy" DNA hasn`t stabilized yet. One minute he`s suave, and the next he`s struggling not to puke on a girl`s shoes. Before the DNA can take hold fully, Karin launches a plan involving Junta`s childhood friend, Ami. Could it be that the Mega-Playboy`s charm doesn`t work on everyone?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Night of the Festival is...Ami
